address: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France
things_to_do: Climb to the top for panoramic city views, visit the first-floor glass floor, and dine at the restaurant. Evening visits offer spectacular lighting displays.
Explore world-famous artworks including the Mona Lisa, Venus de Milo, and ancient Egyptian artifacts. Audio guides and guided tours available.
Experience thrilling rides based on popular movies, watch live shows, meet characters, and enjoy themed dining. Harry Potter and Jurassic Park attractions are highlights.

address: Central Park, New York, NY 10024, USA
things_to_do: Stroll through 843 acres of green space, rent a rowboat on the lake, visit the zoo, enjoy outdoor concerts, and see famous landmarks like Bethesda Fountain.

address: St Katharine's & Wapping, London EC3N 4AB, UK
things_to_do: See the Crown Jewels, explore the medieval White Tower, meet the Beefeaters, and learn about the Tower's dark history including executions and imprisonment.

address: Great Russell St, London WC1B 3DG, UK
things_to_do: Discover artifacts from around the world including the Rosetta Stone, Egyptian mummies, and the Parthenon sculptures. Free admission with optional donation.
Marvel at Gaudi's unfinished masterpiece with its unique architecture, climb the towers for city views, and explore the intricate facades and interior design.
Walk through Gaudi's colorful park with mosaic sculptures, enjoy panoramic views of Barcelona, and visit the Gaudi House Museum. The main terrace offers stunning cityscapes.

address: 1 Chome-1-2 Oshiage, Sumida City, Tokyo 131-0045, Japan
things_to_do: Ascend to observation decks at 350m and 450m for breathtaking views of Tokyo. Visit the shopping complex, aquarium, and planetarium at the base.

address: 2 Chome-3-1 Asakusa, Taito City, Tokyo 111-0032, Japan
things_to_do: Explore Tokyo's oldest temple, shop at Nakamise shopping street, participate in traditional rituals, and enjoy seasonal festivals. The main hall and five-story pagoda are must-sees.
